ModMetaData.name: Hyena (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Zaljerem
ModMetaData.description:
Original mod by Coalcat https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1544321935
Continued by shakeyourbunny https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2255067914
If the original author requests it, I will remove this update.
--
Added "A Dog Said" patch, and both Hyenas now use the same meat.
[1.3 only] If you run Vanilla Animals Expanded - Desert, its Hyena is patched to use the same meat as the two from this mod.
[1.4/1.5] If you run Vanilla Animals Expanded and/or HC Animals Continued, their hyenas are removed.
If you run [XND] Nocturnal Animals (Continued), Hyenas are nocturnal.
--
Original mod notes (1.2):
Adds hyena, Make you feel uncomfortable and Heck up your base with PACKS. HA! They are living in desert, arid, and jungle biomes. can appears in temperature forest! And Watch out their Mouth, Their mouth-grip strength is very powerful. YEET!
STRIPE HYENA ADDED!
Korean Translation included.
